documents.content: 52-year-old male presents for medication refill. PMH: HTN, GERD. Current medications: lisinopril, omeprazole. Patient reports excellent control of both conditions. Recent labs: HbA1c 5.4%, fasting glucose 95, normal metabolic panel. No diabetes. BP 124/78. Continue current medications.
